The report cited a person with knowledge of the investigation, but Calpers spokesman Clark McKinley said the fund does not have any knowledge of a probe by the SEC: As far as we know, there has not been any SEC notice of an investigation. California State Treasurer Bill Lockyer 's office also has not been contacted by the SEC regarding any disclosure issues.
